game.name: Gunner Deadly Expedition
game.shortDescription: 포수 치명적인 원정대는 당신이 당신의 휴가를 파괴하려고 악한 클론의 떼거리와 싸워야하는 하이브리드 슈팅 게임과 플랫 포머입니다. 싸움,플랫폼에 뛰어 더 발전 황금 키를 찾습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Gunner Deadly expedition - In this shoot em up + platformer hybrid game, you have to fight hordes of your evil clones who are trying to ruin your vacation. Take your rifle and show who's in charge

reviewHighlights.text: Minimalistic and quite dynamic platformer. I hope the author will add achievements to the game.
Unpretentious in execution, but in some places hardcore platformer on a military theme. The graphics are reminiscent of the old console, and the gamep...
